description.zh-cn: 日本理论物理学家，理学博士，曾任京都大学、大阪大学名誉教授。因提出介子理论，成为首位获得诺贝尔奖的日本人。
description.en: A Japanese theoretical physicist, Doctor of Science, and emeritus professor at Kyoto University and Osaka University. He was the first Japanese Nobel laureate for his prediction of the meson.

description.zh-cn: 汤川秀树的出生地，日本的首都。
description.en: The birthplace of Hideki Yukawa and the capital of Japan.

description.zh-cn: 汤川秀树成长、长期工作和逝世的城市。
description.en: The city where Hideki Yukawa grew up, worked for a long time, and passed away.

description.zh-cn: 日本地质学家，汤川秀树的父亲。
description.en: A Japanese geologist and the father of Hideki Yukawa.

description.zh-cn: 日本的一所前帝国大学，是京都大学的前身。汤川秀树在此学习和工作多年。
description.en: A former imperial university in Japan, the predecessor of Kyoto University. Hideki Yukawa studied and worked here for many years.

description.zh-cn: 位于日本大阪府的国立大学。汤川秀树曾在此任教并获得博士学位。
description.en: A national university in Osaka Prefecture, Japan. Hideki Yukawa taught and received his doctorate here.

description.zh-cn: 汤川秀树的外祖父，汉学素养丰富，对汤川的早年教育有重要影响。
description.en: Hideki Yukawa's maternal grandfather, who was well-versed in Sinology and had a significant influence on Yukawa's early education.

description.zh-cn: 日本物理学家，1965年诺贝尔物理学奖得主，与汤川秀树是中学至大学的同期生。
description.en: A Japanese physicist and Nobel laureate in Physics in 1965, who was a contemporary of Hideki Yukawa from middle school to university.

description.zh-cn: 日本物理学家和电气工程学家，曾任大阪帝国大学理学部主任教授，帮助汤川秀树获得在该校的教职。
description.en: A Japanese physicist and electrical engineer, who was the head professor of the Faculty of Science at Osaka Imperial University and helped Hideki Yukawa get a teaching position there.

description.zh-cn: 汤川秀树的妻子。
description.en: The wife of Hideki Yukawa.

description.zh-cn: 由汤川秀树于1935年提出的理论，用于解释原子核内质子与中子之间的强相互作用，并预言了介子的存在。
description.en: A theory proposed by Hideki Yukawa in 1935 to explain the strong interaction between protons and neutrons within the atomic nucleus, and predicted the existence of mesons.

description.zh-cn: 一种强相互作用的基本粒子，其存在由汤川秀树的理论所预言。
description.en: A type of subatomic particle that participates in the strong interaction, whose existence was predicted by Hideki Yukawa's theory.

description.zh-cn: 英国物理学家，因在宇宙线中发现π介子而获得1950年诺贝尔物理学奖，他的发现证实了汤川秀树的理论。
description.en: A British physicist who was awarded the 1950 Nobel Prize in Physics for his discovery of the pion (pi-meson) in cosmic rays, a discovery that confirmed Hideki Yukawa's theory.

description.zh-cn: 一种介子，由塞西尔·鲍威尔于1947年发现，证实了汤川秀树的理论。
description.en: A type of meson discovered by Cecil Powell in 1947, confirming Hideki Yukawa's theory.

description.zh-cn: 诺贝尔奖的奖项之一，旨在奖励在物理学领域做出最重要发现或发明的个人。汤川秀树于1949年获得该奖项。
description.en: One of the Nobel Prizes, awarded to those who have made the most important discoveries or inventions in the field of physics. Hideki Yukawa received this award in 1949.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国纽约市的私立研究型大学，汤川秀树曾在此担任客座教授。
description.en: A private research university in New York City, United States, where Hideki Yukawa served as a visiting professor.

nodes.id: 京都大学基础物理学研究所

zh-cn: 京都大学基础物理学研究所

description.zh-cn: 隶属于京都大学的理论物理学研究机构，汤川秀树是其首任所长。
description.en: A research institute for theoretical physics affiliated with Kyoto University, of which Hideki Yukawa was the first director.

description.zh-cn: 一份由罗素和爱因斯坦起草，呼吁世界各国领导人通过和平方式解决国际冲突的反核战争宣言，汤川秀树是签署人之一。
description.en: A manifesto drafted by Bertrand Russell and Albert Einstein calling on world leaders to resolve international conflicts peacefully, which warned of the dangers of nuclear weapons. Hideki Yukawa was one of its signatories.

description.zh-cn: 英国的國家科學院，汤川秀树于1963年当选为其外籍会士。
description.en: The national academy of sciences of the United Kingdom. Hideki Yukawa was elected a Foreign Member in 1963.

description.zh-cn: 日本物理学家，被称为“日本近代物理学之父”，是汤川秀树的博士导师。
description.en: A Japanese physicist known as the 'father of modern physics in Japan', and was Hideki Yukawa's doctoral advisor.

description.zh-cn: 日本天体物理学家，汤川秀树的博士生。
description.en: A Japanese astrophysicist and a doctoral student of Hideki Yukawa.

description.zh-cn: 日本理论物理学家，汤川秀树的博士生。
description.en: A Japanese theoretical physicist and a doctoral student of Hideki Yukawa.

description.zh-cn: 日本历史学家，专攻中国古代史，是汤川秀树的兄长。
description.en: A Japanese historian specializing in ancient Chinese history, and the elder brother of Hideki Yukawa.

description.zh-cn: 日本中国文学研究者，是汤川秀树的弟弟。
description.en: A Japanese researcher of Chinese literature and the younger brother of Hideki Yukawa.

description.zh-cn: 日本冶金学家，是汤川秀树的兄长。
description.en: A Japanese metallurgist and the elder brother of Hideki Yukawa.

description.zh-cn: 汤川秀树于1907年出生于东京市麻布区市兵卫町。
description.en: Hideki Yukawa was born in Ichibeicho, Azabu-ku, Tokyo City in 1907.

description.zh-cn: 汤川秀树是地质学家小川琢治的第三个儿子。
description.en: Hideki Yukawa was the third son of geologist Takuji Ogawa.

description.zh-cn: 小川琢治于1908年就任京都帝国大学教授，因此举家迁往京都。
description.en: In 1908, Takuji Ogawa became a professor at Kyoto Imperial University, causing the family to move to Kyoto.

description.zh-cn: 汤川秀树在五六岁时，跟着外祖父小川驹橘学习背诵四书，培养了对汉字的亲近感。
description.en: At the age of five or six, Hideki Yukawa learned to recite the Four Books from his maternal grandfather, Komakichi Ogawa, which fostered his familiarity with Chinese characters.

description.zh-cn: 汤川秀树与朝永振一郎是京都一中、三高、京都帝国大学的同期生。
description.en: Hideki Yukawa and Sin-Itiro Tomonaga were contemporaries at Kyoto First Middle School, the Third High School, and Kyoto Imperial University.

description.zh-cn: 1929年，汤川秀树从京都帝国大学理学部物理学科毕业。
description.en: In 1929, Hideki Yukawa graduated from the Department of Physics, Faculty of Science, Kyoto Imperial University.

description.zh-cn: 汤川秀树于1929年任京都帝国大学助手，1932年任讲师，1939年任教授。
description.en: Hideki Yukawa became an assistant at Kyoto Imperial University in 1929, a lecturer in 1932, and a professor in 1939.

description.zh-cn: 在八木秀次的帮助下，汤川秀树于1933年开始兼任大阪帝国大学讲师。
description.en: With the help of Hidetsugu Yagi, Hideki Yukawa began serving as a lecturer at Osaka Imperial University in 1933.

description.zh-cn: 汤川秀树于1933年兼任大阪帝国大学讲师，1936年升任助理教授。
description.en: Hideki Yukawa served as a lecturer at Osaka Imperial University starting in 1933 and was promoted to assistant professor in 1936.

description.zh-cn: 汤川秀树于1932年与汤川澄子结婚，并入赘汤川家。
description.en: Hideki Yukawa married Sumiko Yukawa in 1932 and was adopted into the Yukawa family.

description.zh-cn: 1935年，汤川秀树发表论文提出介子理论，解释核力并预言了介子的存在。
description.en: In 1935, Hideki Yukawa published a paper proposing the meson theory, which explained nuclear forces and predicted the existence of the meson.

description.zh-cn: 1938年，汤川秀树因其对基本粒子相互作用的研究获得大阪帝国大学理学博士学位。
description.en: In 1938, Hideki Yukawa was awarded a Doctor of Science degree from Osaka Imperial University for his research on the interaction of elementary particles.

description.zh-cn: 1947年，英国物理学家塞西尔·鲍威尔在宇宙线中发现了π介子，证实了汤川秀树的介子理论。
description.en: In 1947, British physicist Cecil Powell discovered the pi-meson in cosmic rays, thereby confirming Hideki Yukawa's meson theory.

description.zh-cn: 因预言介子的存在，汤川秀树于1949年获得诺贝尔物理学奖。
description.en: For his prediction of the existence of mesons, Hideki Yukawa was awarded the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1949.

description.zh-cn: 汤川秀树于1949年担任哥伦比亚大学客席教授。
description.en: Hideki Yukawa served as a visiting professor at Columbia University in 1949.

relationships.target: 京都大学基础物理学研究所

description.zh-cn: 汤川秀树于1953年担任京都大学基础物理学研究所首任所长。
description.en: In 1953, Hideki Yukawa became the first director of the Yukawa Institute for Theoretical Physics at Kyoto University.

description.zh-cn: 1955年，汤川秀树签署了《罗素—爱因斯坦宣言》。
description.en: In 1955, Hideki Yukawa signed the Russell–Einstein Manifesto.

description.zh-cn: 汤川秀树于1963年当选为伦敦皇家学会外籍会士。
description.en: Hideki Yukawa was elected a Foreign Member of the Royal Society of London in 1963.

description.zh-cn: 仁科芳雄是汤川秀树的博士导师。
description.en: Yoshio Nishina was Hideki Yukawa's doctoral advisor.

description.zh-cn: 林忠四郎是汤川秀树的博士生。
description.en: Chushiro Hayashi was a doctoral student of Hideki Yukawa.

description.zh-cn: 坂田昌一是汤川秀树的博士生。
description.en: Shoichi Sakata was a doctoral student of Hideki Yukawa.

description.zh-cn: 贝冢茂树是汤川秀树的兄长。
description.en: Shigeki Kaizuka was Hideki Yukawa's elder brother.

description.zh-cn: 小川环树是汤川秀树的弟弟。
description.en: Tamaki Ogawa was Hideki Yukawa's younger brother.

description.zh-cn: 小川芳树是汤川秀树的兄长。
description.en: Yoshiki Ogawa was Hideki Yukawa's elder brother.
